title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: There is a bug in Photon where the popup menu does not appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor.
OB: When I right-clicked on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, no popup menu appeared.
EB: The expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
Expected: A popup menu should appear.
Actual: No popup menu appears.
